getFileString

public static java.lang.String getFileString(java.net.URL url,
                                             boolean breakLines)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
Tries to read the file denoted by the given URL into a string

Parameters:
url - the url to be read from
breakLines -
Returns:
the content of the document specified through url
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if connection cannot be established
